ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Changes on Test for all Classes.
ygData.msgSnippet: Our guild has killed Velk v.1 and Velk v.2 and *no* Donal s BP s were used or abused in the slaying of this monster! It s kinda hard to say how much hp s a
ygData.messageBody:
Our guild has killed Velk v.1 and Velk v.2 and *no* Donal's BP's were used
or abused in the slaying of this monster!

It's kinda hard to say how much hp's a given mob has - what with regen rates
and varying times of battle. Velk has *a lot* of hp's. Our fights with him
go for 15+ minutes. We log hits as best we can. He does more damage to us
than we do to him but we have better healers! Also, we res folks in battle
- sometimes 2 or 3 times. In a long fight, you will need to do alot of
damage to him. 500k seems high iirc - more like 200k but if you fight him
for 40 minutes... he is gonna regen a lot more hps.

Sylly Songsynger
(The Pantheon)
Troubador, somewhere on Innoruuk...


-----Original Message-----
From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 3:34 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Changes on Test for all Classes.


I have heard that Velketor the Sorcerer has 500k, ick

Rokenn
